summary:
Headline:
AMD delivered solid Q2 2024 results with 8% revenue growth year-over-year, driven by strong demand in data center and client processor segments. Margins improved notably, and the company raised its full-year revenue guidance.

Growth & revenue drivers:
- Revenue increased 8% YoY.
- Growth primarily fueled by data center and client processor demand.

Margins / profitability:
- Gross margin expanded by 120 basis points, attributed to a favorable product mix.
- Operating expenses declined 4%, reflecting ongoing cost efficiencies in headcount and marketing.

Guidance & outlook:
- Raised full-year revenue guidance to mid-teens percentage growth.
- Expect further margin expansion in the second half of the fiscal year.

Risks / watchpoints:
- No specific risks or headwinds mentioned in the remarks.
- Monitor execution on margin expansion and sustained demand in key segments.
